attributes.action: Reduce the Speed limit on Motorways in adverse weather conditions
attributes.additional_details:
Make the advisory speed limits shown  on overhead traffic information signs MANDATORY   and compulsory  especially when there is adverse weather such as fog,  snow, Ice,  Hailstones, Torrential rain.

Amend the Highway Code to  encourage drivers to slow down and also lengthen the gap between the vehicle in front  when there is bad weather.
